description: A tool to interact with a coordinate system. * Fragments of this class will only work when placed directly under a `CoordinateSystem` fragment. * @example ```jsonc { "id": "myTool", "class": "CsTool", "text": "My New Tool", "icon": "https://mastory.io/my-tool-icon.png" } ```

text.description: The text to show on the toolbar button. If blank, only an icon will be shown.

icon.description: An icon to show on the toolbar button.
